channel.title: 508 KDR Command?
channel.description: my people in my server has been asking me can you add kdr to this server. i have no clue what kdr is and i have no idea what it does. so please explain to me and if your willing to please post the command here.

item.title: 508 KDR Command?
item.dc:creator: @Legit_Pkz Legit Pkz
item.description:
@Legit_Pkz wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals(“kdr”)) {
double KDR = ((double)p.KC)/((double)p.DC);
p.requestForceChat2(“My Kill/Death ratio is “+p.KC+”/”+p.DC+"; “+KDR+”.");
}

What this does is when you kill/die and do ::kdr it says your kill/death ratio
like if you killed 1 person and died once it would make your person say My Kill/Death ratio is 1/1; 1.0.

Read full topic
